  • Constructor Details

    • newScoreController

      public newScoreController()

  • Method Details

    • bestnames

      public void bestnames()
      Allows Players with a high score to write their names

    • setlevel

      public void setlevel(int level)
      Sets the level of game played. This method is used to maintain and relay the level of the game played to the End GUI in case the player wants to play again.
      Parameters:
      level - level of played game

    • setBestPlayers

      public void setBestPlayers(Player[] players)
      Sets the local variable bestplayers to a new value. Players with a high score are given to the newScore GUI.
      Parameters:
      players - player list

    • setAllplayers

      public void setAllplayers(Player[] players)
      Sets the local variable allplayers to a new value. All players and their information are given to the newScore GUI.
      Parameters:
      players - player list

    • updateleaderboard

      public void updateleaderboard() throws TransformerException
      updates the high score list and high score xml file.
      Throws:
      TransformerException - general exception that occurs during the course of a transformation.

    • isinputempty

      public boolean isinputempty()
      Returns:
      if the player has not filled in their name.

    • setOptions

      public void setOptions(HashMap<String,Integer> options)
      Writes the options variable to maintain the same settings from the played game. The local options variable will then be used in starting the End Gui in order for the player to play again with the same settings.
      Parameters:
      options - a Hashmap of options and their values.
